page.title: 01Introduction to Congleton
page.content: { Congleton}is a town built upon the banks of the River Dane. It is known as 'Bear Town' because in Tudor Times the town bear died and money saved for a church bible was used to buy a new bear. {Congleton}is also renowned for its carnival which is the biggest in Europe and is held every two years. Its main industries are Berisfords and Siemens. Berisfords depicts the traditional ribbon industry, whereas Siemens is a modern electrical and electronic firm, new to this area. {Congleton}has many leisure facilities, the main one being the leisure centre. The town is surrounded by beautiful countryside which includes villages, farms and Europes largest sand quarry!
